But yeah, it was the end of my second quest on my server. You get awarded members =p

item.title: My Members
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

public void AwardMems() {
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("Close Window", 4912);//Close Text
sendQuest("Well Done, If you are viewing this then", 4913);//Line 1
sendQuest("You have completed the quest:", 4911);//Line 2
sendQuest("Pigs On The Line", 4914);//Line 3
sendQuest("As a reward you have got Member Status!", 4915);//Line 4
sendQuest("                Well Done!", 4918);//Line 5
sendQuest("This award goes to: " + playerName, 4916);//Line 6 - This text is centered
showInterface(4909);
flushOutStream();
}
case 2677:
				sendMessage("Well Done! You have just been awarded member status!");
				AwardMems();
				playerIsMember = 1;
				savegame(true);//savegame = true;
			break;

Read full topic
